visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart displaying the 'AAPL Stock Price'. The chart includes a title styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 18px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a lighter gray color and a font size of 12px, while the y-axis title is styled with a font size of 14px. The data series for 'AAPL' is set to fetch data from the specified URL, with the series color set to a light blue. The chart also includes a legend, export options, and a range selector for time-based data. The background color of the chart is set to a light gray, and the margins are adjusted to provide better spacing around the chart elements.
